x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
ProjectAny aims to provide a flexible, platform-agnostic idea submission and collaboration portal for nonprofits and civic organizations to propose, track, and develop social-impact projects.

The proposal includes templates for idea submission, lightweight matching of volunteers and mentors, and integration points for ServiceNow workflows to manage approvals and project milestones.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Organizations and volunteers lack a lightweight, centralized place to create, discover, and collaborate on civic-tech proposals; current tools are fragmented and hard to track.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: ProjectAny — Flexible Idea Submission & Collaboration Portal
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
What is the proposed solution?

ProjectAny will provide a ServiceNow-based submission form for ideas, an automated review pipeline, and a simple matching service to connect proposals with volunteers and mentors.

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Portal for submission UI
  • Flow Designer for automations
  • IntegrationHub for external integrations

Potential integration points

External volunteer directories, GitHub repositories for code, and cloud storage for artifacts.
